_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The cause and reason why human numbers h: They're overcome by immoral greed and mired in wrong thoughts
Taking up sharp knives, they murder each other
The heavens don't provide enough rain, so there's famine, a bad harvest, with blighted crops that turn to straw
Native spirits let vicious monsters loose
